C. 1st Conclusions (23)) Note by the Secretary.At the meeting of the Cabinet on Tuesday, 30thJanuary, 1923, (Cabinet 4 (23) Conclusion 4), the Cabinet agreed(a) To give preliminary approval to list (A*), except the Air Force Bill and to lists (A) (B) and (C) in the lists submitted to the Home Affairs Committee, leaving the other Bills in lists (D) and (E) for further consideration by the Cabinet or the Committee on Home Affairs:(ta) To adjourn the question of the Air Force Bill until the Secretary of State for Air could be present.(Signed) M.P.A. HANKSY.tehall Gardens, S.E.1.1st February. 1925.'
